name: Steigenberger Hotel Bad Homburg

reviews.text: I stayed at the hotel for about a week in February, 2003. Not only are the rooms beautiful and elegant (the closet in our suite would have made a comfortable library/den in one's house, and the built-ins were exquisite), but the ambiance reflected the liesurely life of the German Court prior to World War I when the Kasier and Empress had their summer spa in the nearby Schloss (a palace well worth the visit).
reviews.title: Old World Grace/Modern Luxury

description: The Steigenberger Hotel Bad Homburg is located virtually on the doorstep of Frankfurt. The hotel offers modern first-class comfort and an elegant ambience – the perfect address in which to discover the charm of the historical city of Bad Homburg. Or venture into the lively city of Frankfurt and the beautiful surrounding “Taunus” forest areas.
